The Zonal Geometry as Table tool calculates the geometry measures for each zone in a dataset and reports the results as a table.

The input that defines the boundaries of the zones.

For feature inputs, the count depends on additional factors such as filtering criteria and the analysis extent.

The field that contains the values that define each zone.

Specifies the cell size of the analysis raster that will be created to calculate the geometry.

The name of the zonal geometry table layer that will be created and added to the map.

The name of the folder in My content where the result will be saved.
